_sText:
<fieldset>de_subway Ver. 2

by ManO-TPF
manorton@gmail.com
http://www.dev4gamers.com/gallery

DESC
DE_SUBWAY is a bomb defuse map for CS:S

Counter-Terrorists: Prevent Terrorists
from bombing the subway tracks.  As you 
travel down the track make sure to keep
away from the third rail and oncoming trains.

Terrorists: The Terrorist carrying the
C4 must place the bomb at one of the two
bomb sites at the end of the tunnel.
As with the CT's watch that third rail 
and oncoming trains.


This is my first map.  I used it as a means to learn
Hammer and get ready for the release of DoD:S

I hope you enjoy it.

------------------------------------------------------
INSTALLATION:
Unrar this file in your counter-strike source/cstrike/maps directory.


ChangeLOG:

Ver 2  12/14/04
1.  Geometry added to Train path to help prevent sound leak and problems with the source engine.  (Possible BUG)
2.  Bomb zones enlarged to make it easier for the T's to plant
3.  Made T spawn less crowded to make getting out easier.
4.  Addition of a duct to facilitate passage from one upper platform to another.
5.  Additional exit for CT's
6.  Added wall to T's spawn exit to help balance game.
